short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over a post's comment url to see the top 10 comments for that post. Works with RES.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hover over a post's comment url to see the top 10 voted comments for that post. If Reddit Enhancement Suite is installed comments will open when an image or video expand link is clicked. Drag, drop and resize the pop-up however you like! 

-Vote support coming soon. 









**Extension image created by Taylor Wright-Sanson
